children.text: Classic plain silver bowl perfect for serving and ceremonial use. Handcrafted with traditional techniques.
Elegant bowl with sophisticated matte finish design, combining modern aesthetics with traditional craftsmanship.
Traditional bowl featuring intricate Nagas (serpent) design, symbolizing protection and prosperity.
Uniquely shaped bowl inspired by pumpkin form, perfect for decorative and functional use.
Precisely machine-engraved bowl with detailed patterns, showcasing contemporary manufacturing excellence.

Traditional South Indian water vessel with classic plain finish, essential for ceremonial purposes.
Sacred water vessel featuring Ashtalakshmi design, representing the eight forms of wealth and prosperity.
Artistically hand-engraved Chombu with intricate traditional patterns by skilled craftsmen.
Ceremonial water vessel adorned with Nagas motifs, combining spiritual significance with artistic beauty.
Precision-engraved Chombu with detailed patterns, merging traditional form with modern technique.
